main event: On April 20, 1952, Capt. and Lt. observed an unidentified aerial object in Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15-20 seconds and remained flat and long,It was bright enough to reflect light 45Â° above the horizon,It exhibited no trail or noise and disappeared above cloud level,Two Air Force officers were the main witnesses,The object was reported at a high speed without any change in course or speed.
witness description: Capt. and Lt. both from Ohio, redacted names
